column2: pheebs can you help me pick out an engagement ring for monica
should i get her a tiffany cut or a princess cut or a ah ah
now have you told anyone else
no i don’t want to tell anybody else because i don’t want monica to find out
well it’s because i trust you you’re one of my best friends and you walked in on me when i was looking at ring brochures
yeah well once again not knocking pays off
i only wish you hadn’t been on the toilet
so chandler wanna go to the coffeehouse
oh perfect we were just gonna see if you wanted to go
oh well we don’t because we got…the…other pl place
so how are things going with paul
although y’know he he’s a private guy
y’know i wish i could get him to open up a little bit share some feelings
you just have to think of him as a as a jar of pickles that won’t open
so what are you saying i should run him under hot water and bang his head against a table
no that’s what you do when you want to get the truth out of someone
so how are things going with you
hey pheebs what what was the deal with you and chandler blowing us off before
please i think you know why
come on ross you’re a paleontologist dig a little deeper
wait a minute is it because joey and i didn’t invite him to that knicks game a couple of weeks ago
do you think that’s something that he’d be mad at you for
well then i think that’s it
well if he’s angry he really shouldn’t just cover it up
i i wish he would just tell me the truth
oh if that’s what you want you then you really should run his head under hot water and bang his head against a table
honey i made a reservation at china garden is that okay
but first wait talk to me talk to me
what are you thinking right now
i’m thinking that you are looking really fine it that dress
yeah that’s great paul but y’know i wanna know what wow those are really great
i just wanna know what what is behind this this strong silent exterior
y’know they say that still waters run deep and i wanna swim in yours
are you talking about having s x
no paul i don’t know anything about you
okay well then how about puberty
come on that’s always a painful time
y’know your friends invite you to a slumber party and then they stick your hand in warm water while you’re sleeping so that you pee in your sleeping bag
well you’re lucky you never met that bitch sharon majesky
anyway umm… the rest of you life y’know
all right paul i’m not asking for a lot here
when i was six years old
and instead my parents got me this little plastic chicken that you hop around on
it was embarrassing kids made fun of me
that was a pretty tough year
i already feel like i know you a little better
and in fifth grade i got into a fight
well it wasn’t really a fight
richard darinvel bit me on the nose and and i feel down
i still have a little scare right here you can see it
yeah i i i see the scare
listen paul i think this is really great that that y’know you shared your feelings
it’s really it’s beautiful but umm what do you say we go share some food
you love their kung pao chicken
i didn’t mean to do that
this is the nine millionth ring store we’ve been too and i can’t find the perfect ring
okay so maybe you don’t get her a ring
maybe you maybe you do something different
maybe you get her an engagement bracelet y’know
picks one up from the display in the corner
y’know i’m so glad i picked you to help me with this
can you just imagine getting down on one knee and handing her this gorgeous piece of weaponry
yeah i’m gonna stick with the ring
wait a minute no this is this is the reason you brought me
so let me handle this from here on out
i would like to see that ring please
this ring is from the 1920s it’s a one and a half carat diamond with sapphires on either side
sir can i ask you to umm could you…hold out that ring and ask me to marry you
oh my god that’s it that’s the ring
chandler i i will handle this
are you interested in this ring
yes but i can only pay 8 000
okay i can let it go at eight
how would you like to pay
no no but i left my credit card with joey
do you have anything her for 10
uh yes i have these two rather beautiful 5 bills
hey remember how chandler and phoebe blew us off yesterday
well apparently chandler’s angry at us for not getting him a ticket to that knicks game a couple of weeks ago
oh we’re supposed to just get him a ticket
that guy is always mooching off of us
anyway i i still think we should try to patch things up y’know
like uh maybe we could get him to get tickets to another knicks game and invite him
oh wow that’s a great idea
and i still have his credit card
hey hey hey ho ho i got this one
y’know i gotta tell ya sometimes i just i don’t get chandler
y’know me and him do stuff all the time without you and you don’t get all upset
this is all my fault i wanted him to open up
but god i didn’t know that i was gonna unleash this this weepy clingy moist monster
y’know i only know of two surefire ways to shut a man up
and one of them is s x
i don’t know i’ve never had to use the other one
i’m just saying y’know if we’re having s x he’s not gonna be talking
umm i gotta go to the store i told him that i would buy him some more tissues
okay umm i’d also like to try on the tiara
what do you think too much
then take the tiara back and let me hold the musket again
it’s not… okay oh let me see the ring my friend picked out
i just sold it to that gentleman
chandler did your dad ever hug you
it’s just that my dad never did
well you can see my dad in vegas kissing other dads
i’m a little busy here paul
that’s exactly what my dad used to say
do you have my credit card
yes it’s in my… in…in my pocket
oh hey listen i got us tickets to a knicks game tonight
me you and ross and… paul probably…
chandler i found the perfect ring
oh that’s uh that’s pretty nice but i’m gonna go with the one i picked first
oh my god chandler the one you picked is gone
i tired to stop it but they put me in jail
the little jail between the doors
phoebe i asked you to guard the ring
but y’know this ring is better
monica never even saw the other ring
yeah but when he proposed to me with the ring i got goose bumps
so uh was he excited about the tickets
i’m a little mad at him now
he didn’t want to talk to us about being angry well maybe we don’t talk to him at all
from now on it’s gonna be joey and ross best friends
we’re gonna be the new joey and chandler
i have so much more to tell ya i’ve written it all down
y’know i gotta tell ya writing i mean writing gets me uh gets me kinda hot
y’know what i wanted to be when i was that age
i wanted to be one with the waves y’know
okay hold on real quick hold on a second let me just uh get a little more comfortable here
wait now wait a second this isn’t too revealing is it
what ever happened to that little dude
i don’t care about the little dude
i cannot listen to anymore of this
y’know the only person who would want to listen to this is a mental health professional
and then it’s only because they get paid 100 an hour
do you know how much money i could’ve made listening to you
and do you know when i figured that out
i can’t believe you’re trying to stifle me
when just 14 hours ago we figured out that that is exactly what my mother was trying to do to me
i… i i don’t mean i didn’t mean to stifle you
i… this is all just a little overwhelming
i didn’t mean to overwhelm you
it’s just that when those gates open you… hard to close ‘em
i’m so glad i’m so glad you shared
and i’m glad that you’re done
what do you say we umm…
i can’t believe i let you talk me into buying this stupid gumball machine looking ring
it’s not a stupid gumball machine looking ring
when i looked at the other ring i could see monica’s face when i gave it to her y’know
and i could see her saying yes
when i look at this ring all i see is a ring
unless i look at it really closely and then i can see my own eye
look this is the most important thing i’m gonna do in my life
i wanna make sure it’s perfect
there may be a way that we can get the other ring back
‘cause i heard the guy tell the jeweler where he was going to propose
so maybe we can get him to trade rings or something
well you certainly can’t give her that stupid gumball ring
okay and he hasn’t proposed yet because she has no ring on her finger
after this we should solve crimes
okay go go go get him
could you come with me please
do you know who at my office
okay there was a slight mix up at the jewelry store the ring you’re about to propose with was supposed to be held for me
so i’m gonna need to have that back
but in exchange i’m willing to trade you this beautiful more expensive ring
it is beautiful but i’m gonna use this one
this is my fiancee and her heart was set on that ring
you don’t want to break her heart now do you
yeah do you want to break a dying woman’s heart
yeah she’s dying… of a cough apparently
yes and it is my dying wish to have that ring
see if i’m not buried with that ring then my spirit is going to wander the nether world for all eternity…
and you are about to marry a wonderful man
i’ve got something important to tell ya
i’m gonna ask monica to marry me
i think we gotta end the freeze out
wait a minute is this is this for real
so you two are really serious
i mean… we’re gonna be brothers in law
and and and and and and and we’re gonna be friends again
oh it’s water under the bridge forget it
i was gonna wait ‘til uh it was official y’know
but i got so excited i just had to tell you guys because you’re my best friends
i just dumped one cry baby i’ll dump you too
i’m gonna ask monica to marry me
you guys are gonna be so happy
one and a half carat easy
chandler’s gonna ask monica to marry him
oh i know i helped pick out the ring
you told her before you told us
well she walked in when i was looking at the ring brochures
